verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump] [V: tells] [ARG2: reporters] [ARG1: that ex - Illinois Gov. Rod Blagojevich said something dumb but that ' lots of politicians ' do and thinks his sentence is excessive] .
Trump tells reporters that [ARG0: ex - Illinois Gov. Rod Blagojevich] [V: said] [ARG1: something dumb] but that ' lots of politicians ' do and thinks his sentence is excessive .
Trump tells reporters that ex - Illinois Gov. Rod Blagojevich said something dumb but that ' lots of politicians ' [V: do] and thinks his sentence is excessive .
Trump tells reporters that [ARG0: ex - Illinois Gov. Rod Blagojevich] said something dumb but that ' lots of politicians ' do and [V: thinks] [ARG1: his sentence is excessive] .
Trump tells reporters that ex - Illinois Gov. Rod Blagojevich said something dumb but that ' lots of politicians ' do and thinks [ARG1: his sentence] [V: is] [ARG2: excessive] .
